name: Freelancing
description:
Freelancing Freelancing is a Narrative Adventure game where you take up the role of a new Squire, aiming for Knighthood! 

Dress the Knight in various unique outfits, whilst measuring the impact each item has on your core stats: Magic, Strength, Temperature and Weight. Each quest will have different requirements as prescribed in your briefing, so listen closely and balance your gear accordingly.

On return you'll be rewarded (or scolded) for the Knights level of success, and each successful quest will put you one step closer to paying for Knight School! Controls:
  • Freelancing is fully playable with just your mouse! 
  • Keys Space and Enter also progress text boxes
Godot Wild Jam #53

Freelancing is a project made in 9 days, as a part of the Godot Wild Jam #53. The theme for this project was 'Assembly Required' and we used the optional Wild Cards of  '4 Color Limit' and 'Temperature'.

CREDITS
  • Art, Design & Visual conjuration  @Kassiopeeia  || itch: kassipi 
  • Coding, Game Design & Tea Making @Moohm || itch: Moohm
  • Music is from Various Artists
